name: Turretface
description:
Last days of humanity before the robot takeover, a handfull of people still alive in a special build "rigs" fight back. Turretface is a topdown shooter with some random elements.

WASD or arrow keys to move, mouse1 to shoot mouse2 to punch.

There is some known bugs and things i could improve on. I might come back and update this, but currently i dont have motivation to continue this game and i want to move onto new projects.
